item.title: In a yellow statement lehenga, Shehnaaz Gill blooms like a beautiful sunflower. PICTURES
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.description:
Shehnaaz Gill, a singer, and actor, is a total knockout, as evidenced by her social media. The Honsla Rakh actress frequently takes to Instagram to dazzle the fashion police with her designer-filled wardrobe. Speaking of which, on Friday, January 21, the star once again managed to steal the show with her desi girl look. Needless […]

The post In a yellow statement lehenga, Shehnaaz Gill blooms like a beautiful sunflower. PICTURES appeared first on Daily Topics.
item.content:encoded:
Shehnaaz Gill, a singer, and actor, is a total knockout, as evidenced by her social media. The Honsla Rakh actress frequently takes to Instagram to dazzle the fashion police with her designer-filled wardrobe. Speaking of which, on Friday, January 21, the star once again managed to steal the show with her desi girl look. Needless to say, fans are adoring her new traditional look.

Shehnaaz Gill can be seen blooming like a sunflower in an elegant yellow sequin lehenga in the new photos. Her latest stunning look is accentuated by an organza lehenga with gorgeous borders. Shehnaaz Gill completed her look with a statement bandhgala necklace and matching earrings. Shehnaaz, who was striking vibrant poses and sharing her stunning look, asked her fans, “How’s the day?”

Shehnaaz Gill’s most recent statement look is shown below:

View this post on Instagram

A post shared by Shehnaaz Gill (@shehnaazgill)

Shehnaaz Gill was most recently seen in the Punjabi film Honsla Rakh, alongside Diljit Dosanjh and Sonam Bajwa. The Punjabi romantic comedy, directed by Amarjit Singh Saron, was released during the Dusshera festival. Honsla Rakh was co-produced by Thind Motion Films and Story Time Production in Vancouver, Canada.

Shehnaaz Gill’s professional career includes appearances in several Punjabi films, including Kala Shah Kala, Sat Shi Akaal England, and Daakaand. Honsla Rakh made a triumphant return to Punjabi cinema after a brief absence. Her latest song, Tu Yaheen Hai, dedicated to late actor Sidharth Shukla, has also received a lot of love from her fan base.

The post In a yellow statement lehenga, Shehnaaz Gill blooms like a beautiful sunflower. PICTURES appeared first on Daily Topics.

item.title: Ananya Panday Lights Up the Internet in a Bralette and Leather Pants
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.description:
Ananya Panday is currently preparing for her upcoming film Gehraiyaan, in which she will co-star with Deepika Padukone, Siddhant Chaturvedi, and Dhairya Karwa. For the film’s promotion, the Gen-Z fashionista wore a trendy bralette and faux leather pants, which set the internet on fire. Ananya Panday Lights Up the Internet in a Bralette and Leather […]

The post Ananya Panday Lights Up the Internet in a Bralette and Leather Pants appeared first on Daily Topics.
item.content:encoded:
Ananya Panday is currently preparing for her upcoming film Gehraiyaan, in which she will co-star with Deepika Padukone, Siddhant Chaturvedi, and Dhairya Karwa. For the film’s promotion, the Gen-Z fashionista wore a trendy bralette and faux leather pants, which set the internet on fire.

Ananya Panday Lights Up the Internet in a Bralette and Leather Pants Provided by Lehren Ananya Panday Lights Up the Internet in a Bralette and Leather Pants
Ananya took to Instagram today to reveal her Gehraiyaan promotional look in a series of photos. “#Gehraiyaan promotions legggggoooo,” she captioned the post. “The trailer is now available.”

The bralette-styled top was paired with chocolate brown faux leather straight-fit pants with front pleats, a loose silhouette, a high-rise waistline, and ankle-length cuffs. She completed her look with animal-print above-the-ankle high-heeled boots.

In ‘Gehraiyaan,’ Ananya will be seen romancing Siddhant Chaturvedi for the first time. The film’s trailer depicted the actress in a new light as a performer, and her fans are eagerly awaiting its release.

Ananya will also appear in “Kho Gaye Hum Kahan” and “Liger” in addition to “Gehraiyaan.”

Instagram Post by Ananya Panday

View this post on Instagram

A post shared by Ananya (@ananyapanday)

The post Ananya Panday Lights Up the Internet in a Bralette and Leather Pants appeared first on Daily Topics.

item.title: Kareena Kapoor Khan, Selena Gomez, and Kriti Sanon are among the celebrities who demonstrated how to shine in blue gowns.
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.description:
The number of virtual parties has recently increased. After all, it’s a soothing remedy that instantly transforms a bad day into a good one. Let’s introduce you to some party glam to get you in the mood to dance. So, are we teasing you with a selection of dresses that seem enticingly appropriate? Indeed, there’s […]

The post Kareena Kapoor Khan, Selena Gomez, and Kriti Sanon are among the celebrities who demonstrated how to shine in blue gowns. appeared first on Daily Topics.
item.content:encoded:
The number of virtual parties has recently increased. After all, it’s a soothing remedy that instantly transforms a bad day into a good one. Let’s introduce you to some party glam to get you in the mood to dance. So, are we teasing you with a selection of dresses that seem enticingly appropriate? Indeed, there’s so much to love about a sparkly dress that you only need a few accessories to complete your party look.

Say goodbye to dull days because we have deep shades of blue to keep you looking pretty. So, let’s see how bright a diamond you can be when you hit the dance floor with your friends. We learned from celebrities who looked stunning in blue gowns with a lot of glitz. Here’s how to put your dress together.

Malaika Arora

This is what it looks like to discover magic in your gown. The Socha Nahin Tha chose a blue sequin gown from Nedo by Nedret Taciroglu, which featured a thigh-high slit and a beaded neckline. Make this your cocktail party outfit; it’s simply stunning. Accessorize appropriately with studded jewelry and ankle-strap stilettos.

Kareena Kapoor Khan’s

The elegantly worn thigh-high slit. Bebo is so typical of himself. Her ink blue sequin dress with shoulder pads, turtleneck, full sleeves, and a drape-like detail looked stunning here, proving she’s a sight to behold at all times. Do you want to experiment with color blocking? Hot pink strappy stilettos will give you the big vibe you’re looking for.

Meghan Markle

Here’s the day when Meghan, the pregnant former Duchess of Sussex, defined regality with her taste in fashion. She wore a shimmery three-quarter sleeve Roland Mouret gown with a boat neck and a knee-high slit. She completed her look with a black clutch and ankle-strap stilettos.

Selena Gomez’s

She walked the hot girl route for the Grammys in a sparkly plunging neckline strappy gown, as she is the pro dresser of every red carpet event. This midnight blue cut-out number looked stunning when paired with hoop earrings.

Kriti Sanon

A sequin bodycon Bardot gown that has me completely smitten. Tell us about this mid-length dress with avant-garde sleeves you sold. It combined the one-shoulder and off-shoulder details in one dress. How often do you encounter something similar? It’s a once-in-a-lifetime find. Accessorize with pink pointed-toe pumps and dangler earrings.

Priyanka Chopra’s

The stunning lady told us she’s hotter than the tropics, and we believe her. She proves it every day, and her look for the Baywatch premiere is proof of that. The 39-year-old wore a plunging neckline wrap-style dress with a thigh-high slit and a high-low hem. This full-sleeved sequin ensemble was held together by a black fabric waist belt and black ankle-strap stilettos.

Which diva’s glitzy blue gown do you want to own? Please share your thoughts in the comments section.

The post Kareena Kapoor Khan, Selena Gomez, and Kriti Sanon are among the celebrities who demonstrated how to shine in blue gowns. appeared first on Daily Topics.

item.title: Kriti Sanon vs. Katrina Kaif: Who looked better in the pink Gucci Bananya hoodie sweatshirt?
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.description:
We’ve already seen celebrities choose similar outfits to others and recreate looks in the first half of the year. When it comes to luxury brands, everyone wants to get their hands on the newest piece and style it their own way. Warmer clothing, such as hoodies, sweaters, and jumpers, is still preferred as the weather […]

The post Kriti Sanon vs. Katrina Kaif: Who looked better in the pink Gucci Bananya hoodie sweatshirt? appeared first on Daily Topics.
item.content:encoded:
We’ve already seen celebrities choose similar outfits to others and recreate looks in the first half of the year. When it comes to luxury brands, everyone wants to get their hands on the newest piece and style it their own way. Warmer clothing, such as hoodies, sweaters, and jumpers, is still preferred as the weather remains cool. And Gucci is one of the world’s most desirable and well-known luxury brands. So it’s only natural that two of Bollywood’s hottest wore it at the same time!

Kriti Sanon

When Kriti Sanon was dubbing for her upcoming film Bachchan Pandey in September, she showed off her cozy #ootd. The Mimi actress used her Instagram stories to tease fans with a sneak peek from her upcoming film. Kriti was seen wearing a pink Gucci Bananya hoodie as she shared a selfie from the studio with the caption, “Guess what I’m dubbing for?” as the actress struck a pose with no makeup and her hair pulled back.

Katrina Kaif

The newlywed actress was spotted at the airport earlier today, wearing the same pink Gucci Bananya hooded sweatshirt. Kat wore the oversized number to keep warm and paired it with latex leggings, Gucci shoes, and a face shield, with her hair, pulled away from her face.

The pink hoodie was clearly a favorite of both divas, who looked adorable in it and put their own spin on it!

Who, in your opinion, wore the Gucci sweatshirt better? Katrina Kaif or Kriti Sanon? Please let us know in the comments section.

The post Kriti Sanon vs. Katrina Kaif: Who looked better in the pink Gucci Bananya hoodie sweatshirt? appeared first on Daily Topics.

item.title: Shackets are popular right now. Take fashion inspiration from Janhvi Kapoor and Gigi Hadid.
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.description:
Every now and then, celebrities take a basic fashion trend and carefully transform it into a hot favorite and must-have for every aspiring fashionista. This winter, we’ll introduce you to a new piece of fusion fashion that several celebrities and models have already embraced as a must-have in their western wardrobes. Shackets! WHAT EXACTLY IS […]

The post Shackets are popular right now. Take fashion inspiration from Janhvi Kapoor and Gigi Hadid. appeared first on Daily Topics.
item.content:encoded:
Every now and then, celebrities take a basic fashion trend and carefully transform it into a hot favorite and must-have for every aspiring fashionista. This winter, we’ll introduce you to a new piece of fusion fashion that several celebrities and models have already embraced as a must-have in their western wardrobes. Shackets!

WHAT EXACTLY IS A SHACKET?

Gigi Hadid dressed down in a denim shacket.
You may have heard about them or seen them but were unable to identify what they were. Let us tell you a sweet love story. It all began when a lovely jacket met a stern shirt. They fell in love and decided to marry by melting into each other’s arms. As a result, the shacket was born! THE new fashion trend is the casual jacket that looks like a shirt but isn’t quite a shirt. It’s simply impossible to get enough of it.

The best thing about shackets is that you can mix and match them with anything. Have a pair of chunky faux leather boots and a slip dress? Shake it up! Thinking about what to wear on your date but don’t want to appear too bulky with layers of warm clothing? Simply shacket it!

If you’re still perplexed, take a look at these celebs who are rocking shackets and doing so in style!

JANHVI KAPOOR

View this post on Instagram

A post shared by Janhvi Kapoor (@janhvikapoor)

Janhvi Kapoor is never afraid to try out a new look. So it was pretty obvious that she’d be removing a shacket like a diva. And she didn’t let me down! Janhvi wore a white crop top, skirt, and shacket with a white denim shacket. We’re obsessed with this girl-next-door look.

GIGI HADID

View this post on Instagram

A post shared by Gigi Hadid (@gigihadid)

Gigi Hadid looks great in almost every outfit she wears, but it’s her fun, casual style that we’re obsessed with. Consider her all-denim ensemble, which she paired with black lace-up boots and socks. Gigi, a new mom, appears to take casualness very seriously!

PARINEETI CHOPRA

View this post on Instagram

A post shared by Parineeti Chopra (@parineetichopra)

Parineeti Chopra’s color palette of a denim shacket, black pants, and a white top will be our new go-to look. She accessorized her ensemble with a crossbody bag and a pair of gold hoops. With some sleek accessories and a dainty purse, you’ll be ready for brunch in no time!

NAVYA NAVELI NANDA

View this post on Instagram

A post shared by Navya Naveli Nanda (@navyananda)

Navya Naveli’s checked shacket with distressed jeans and boots reinvents street style. Navya wore her hair open and a pair of eye-catching black sunglasses. On your way to college or meeting up with a friend for coffee? Allow Navya to lead the way.

KIARA ADVANI

Kiara Advani’s entire look.

Kiara Advani was imprisoned in a shacket.

Kiara Advani stepped out in a cream shacket, a white crop top, and neon orange tights. Kiara accessorized her look with a monochrome tote bag and Chanel shoes. An uncomplicated but stunning look. Don’t you agree?

Which of these looks is your favorite?

The post Shackets are popular right now. Take fashion inspiration from Janhvi Kapoor and Gigi Hadid. appeared first on Daily Topics.

item.title: admires Tom Holland’s work; ‘Physically, he was incredible,’ he says.
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.description:
Willem Dafoe’s reprised role as the Green Goblin garnered the most screams in the midst of all the buzz surrounding the new Marvel superhit film, Spiderman: No Way Home. Fans were overjoyed that Green Goblin had returned, and he was even more evil and sinister than before. In an interview with GQ, Dafoe revealed that […]

The post admires Tom Holland’s work; ‘Physically, he was incredible,’ he says. appeared first on Daily Topics.
item.content:encoded:
Willem Dafoe’s reprised role as the Green Goblin garnered the most screams in the midst of all the buzz surrounding the new Marvel superhit film, Spiderman: No Way Home. Fans were overjoyed that Green Goblin had returned, and he was even more evil and sinister than before. In an interview with GQ, Dafoe revealed that he wanted to go all out for his iconic character.

The Academy Award nominee had made it clear to director Jon Watts and producer Amy Pascal that he would not be content with a mere cameo. He desired something “meaty” that would meaningfully resurrect his character from the 2002 Spiderman film. “It’s fun to do the action sequences, and it’s fun to have resources,” Dafoe continued. He also stated that he usually works on low-budget films, but the Marvel franchise was a whole different ballgame.

During the interview, Dafoe also praised his Spider-Man: No Way Home co-star Tom Holland for his professionalism and physical abilities. “I greatly admire his discipline and commitment to the role,” he said. And he was physically amazing.”

Tom Holland also shared a hilarious anecdote about his first meeting with the Green Goblin actor on set, via Comicbook. While the resurrection of past Spiderman villains remained a mystery, the actors were required to wear black cloaks to conceal their identities. In true Peter Parker fashion, Holland ran into Willem Dafoe without realizing who he was and said, “Watch out, mate.” When Tom realized the cloaked entity was none other than Dafoe in flesh, he exclaimed, “Oh s**t, the Goblin is here.” The Cherry actor continued, “He was wonderful, he was truly wonderful. It was a pleasure to work with her.”

The post admires Tom Holland’s work; ‘Physically, he was incredible,’ he says. appeared first on Daily Topics.

item.title: Liger: Vijay Deverakonda raises his fees; he now charges twice as much as he did for Dear Comrade.
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.description:
Vijay Deverakonda’s stardom has skyrocketed following the phenomenal success of Arjun Reddy. He has become a well-known face not only in the South but throughout India. Now, the dashing hunk is preparing for his upcoming film, Liger. It will be a pan-India film starring Ananya Panday. There is a lot of excitement surrounding the film […]

The post Liger: Vijay Deverakonda raises his fees; he now charges twice as much as he did for Dear Comrade. appeared first on Daily Topics.
item.content:encoded:
Vijay Deverakonda’s stardom has skyrocketed following the phenomenal success of Arjun Reddy. He has become a well-known face not only in the South but throughout India. Now, the dashing hunk is preparing for his upcoming film, Liger. It will be a pan-India film starring Ananya Panday. There is a lot of excitement surrounding the film because it features legendary boxing star, Mike Tyson. In this one, Vijay will take on the role of an MMA fighter. The first trailers for the film have been released, and fans are blown away by the star’s dedication. Well, the actor has also received a large sum of money for the same.

According to the most recent reports, Vijay Deverakonda has charged a hefty sum for Liger. According to tracktollywood.com, the actor has reportedly charged Rs 20 crore for the film. Not only that, but the actor is also entitled to a portion of the film’s profits. Given his popularity, the film is bound to be a success. Thus, Liger appears to be a lucrative venture for Vijay Deverakonda. According to reports, the actor charged Rs 10 crore for his successful film Dear Comrade, which was released in 2019. However, these are only reports, and there has been no official confirmation of anything.

View this post on Instagram

A post shared by Vijay Deverakonda (@thedeverakonda)

Vijay Deverakonda will make his Bollywood debut with Liger. Puri Jagannadh will direct the film, which will be released on August 25, 2022.

The post Liger: Vijay Deverakonda raises his fees; he now charges twice as much as he did for Dear Comrade. appeared first on Daily Topics.

item.title: Gaspard Ulliel, the star of Marvel’s ‘Moon Knight’ series, died at the age of 37 in a skiing accident.
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.description:
Gaspard Ulliel, one of France’s most celebrated actors and a star of Marvel’s upcoming ‘Moon Knight’ series, died on Wednesday after a skiing accident, according to news agency AFP. He was 37 years old. The two-time Cesar Award winner was hospitalized on Tuesday after suffering a head injury and did not recover, according to the […]

The post Gaspard Ulliel, the star of Marvel’s ‘Moon Knight’ series, died at the age of 37 in a skiing accident. appeared first on Daily Topics.
item.content:encoded:
Gaspard Ulliel, one of France’s most celebrated actors and a star of Marvel’s upcoming ‘Moon Knight’ series, died on Wednesday after a skiing accident, according to news agency AFP. He was 37 years old.

The two-time Cesar Award winner was hospitalized on Tuesday after suffering a head injury and did not recover, according to the actor’s family and local agent. He was involved in a collision on the slopes of the Savoie region.

“Gaspard Ulliel grew up with cinema, and cinema grew with him,” French Prime Minister Jean Castex said in a heartfelt tribute to the late actor. They were madly in love with each other. We will miss seeing his most beautiful interpretations with a heavy heart. We have a French actor who has passed away.”

On social media, people are paying their respects to Gaspard Ulliel. Filmmaker Peter Webber, who directed Ulliel in Hannibal Rising, French director and actor Xavier Dolan, who cast the actor as the lead in his It’s Only the End of the World, and French actors Jean Dujardin, Juliette Binoche, and Anthony Delon, among others, all expressed their condolences on the late actor’s death.

View this post on Instagram

A post shared by Xavier Dolan (@xavierdolan)

Ulliel played Midnight Man in ‘Moon Knight,’ but he’s best known for his role in Xavier Dolan’s Canadian-French film ‘It’s Only the End of the World,’ alongside Marion Cotillard, Lea Seydoux, and Vincent Cassel. The film won the Grand Prix at Cannes as well as three Cesars (French Oscars).

In Bertrand Bonello’s biopic ‘Saint Laurent,’ Ulliel also gave a powerful performance as the famous French fashion designer Yves Saint Laurent.

France’s Culture Minister, Roselyne Bachelot, described Ulliel’s death as “so unfair,” saying: “Such a brilliant actor who was reaped by the sickle of death at the peak of his career.”

He was present in our lives for nearly 20 years with magnificent performances, winning his first Cesar for the best male newcomer with ‘A Very Long Engagement.’

The Cannes Film Festival’s Director, Thierry Fremaux, also expressed his condolences. According to ‘Variety,’ Ulliel was a regular on the red carpet in Cannes, where the actor’s films were frequently premiered.

“Gaspard belonged to this new generation of actors who were shaping French cinema for the future.” “He knew how to choose his roles and shape his career in a way that fulfilled every promise,” Fremaux told ‘Variety.’

The post Gaspard Ulliel, the star of Marvel’s ‘Moon Knight’ series, died at the age of 37 in a skiing accident. appeared first on Daily Topics.

item.title: Metro city’s should make road with protection In mind
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.description:
I am alone, and feel the charm of existence in this spot, which was created for the bliss of souls like mine. I am so happy, my dear friend, so absorbed in the exquisite sense of mere tranquil existence, that I neglect my talents. I should be incapable of drawing a single stroke at the […]

The post Metro city’s should make road with protection In mind appeared first on Daily Topics.
item.content:encoded:
I am alone, and feel the charm of existence in this spot, which was created for the bliss of souls like mine.

I am so happy, my dear friend, so absorbed in the exquisite sense of mere tranquil existence, that I neglect my talents.

I should be incapable of drawing a single stroke at the present moment; and yet I feel that I never was a greater artist than now.

When, while the lovely valley teems with vapour around me, and the meridian sun strikes the upper surface of the impenetrable foliage of my trees, and but a few stray gleams steal into the inner sanctuary, I throw myself down among the tall grass by the trickling stream; and, as I lie close to the earth, a thousand unknown plants are noticed by me: when I hear the buzz of the little world among the stalks, and grow familiar with the countless indescribable forms of the insects and flies, then I feel the presence of the Almighty, who formed us in his own image, and the breath of that universal love which bears and sustains us, as it floats around us in an eternity of bliss; and then, my friend, when darkness overspreads my eyes, and heaven and earth seem to dwell in my soul and absorb its power, like the form of a beloved mistress, then I often think with longing, Oh, would I could describe these conceptions, could impress upon paper all that is living so full and warm within me, that it might be the mirror of my soul, as my soul is the mirror of the infinite God!

O my friend — but it is too much for my strength — I sink under the weight of the splendour of these visions! A wonderful serenity has taken possession of my entire soul, like these sweet mornings of spring which I enjoy with my whole heart. I am alone, and feel the charm of existence in this spot, which was created for the bliss of souls like mine.

I am so happy, my dear friend, so absorbed in the exquisite sense of mere tranquil existence, that I neglect my talents. I should be incapable of drawing a single stroke at the present moment; and yet I feel that I never was a greater artist than now. When, while the lovely valley teems with vapour around me, and the meridian sun strikes the upper surface of the impenetrable foliage of my trees, and but a few stray gleams steal into the inner sanctuary, I throw myself down among the tall grass by the trickling stream; and, as I lie close to the earth, a thousand unknown plants are noticed by me: when I hear the buzz of the little world among the stalks, and grow familiar with the countless indescribable forms of the insects and

The post Metro city’s should make road with protection In mind appeared first on Daily Topics.
